name: Wild Forest Hunter
description:
Play as a big game trophy hunter!  Try to shoot as many animals as you can before the timer runs out, you'll have to achieve a minimum score to advance to the next map.

There are a total of 6 short maps, try to clear them all !!

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse Button - Fire weapon (when not reloading) Escape Key - Pause menu

* Made for a gamejam

** Requires a browser that supports WebGL / WebAssembly

*** First time load can be slow - if it freezes or gives error then just refresh the webpage and it will resume downloading the game files to cache
